game.name: Tap the zombies
game.description:
Hot zombies games are always in great demand. This time we have brought to you a brand new action packaged game where a huge horde of zombies is coming to welcome you! Do you want to experience this thrill right away? Join Tap the Zombies and get ready to witness the biggest virtual destruction of your life! Hey! Your majesty tapping will be enough to kill them and allow you to become a winner of this free online zombie game. Hope you will have a great fun by joining this newest action challenge!

You will definitely invite your friends after playing this one of the best new games on the internet in your device. Dealing with the zombies in this game will surely be a unique experience for you. Your winning will depend on your concentration and fast reaction. Keep your eyes on top of the screen from where a group of zombies will keep coming down the road. This will be repeated in each level in this 12 levels zombie game. Click the zombies to smash them. 

Remember, all these deadly zombies are very fast and looking forward to reach the bottom of the screen and road. Try to smash them fast since if too many of them escape, you will lose the level immediately! Complete each level with 3 stars by smashing all of them! We know that you have the needful skill to kill all the zombies and make yourself feel proud. At our free online game website, we carry a great number of top games to play. Also give them a try to keep you engrossed for hours!!
